version_description:
This version includes general bug fixes and enhancements. 
We update the app regularly to help improve your experience. Thanks for using The West Australian app.

This version includes general bug fixes and enhancements. 
We update the app regularly to help improve your experience. Thanks for using The West Australian app.

This version includes general bug fixes and enhancements. 
We update the app regularly to help improve your experience. Thanks for using The West Australian app.

In this version we have introduced a complimentary trial for our app which will move to subscription only access on 16 July 2019. 

During this trial you’ll have complimentary access to our premium news, opinion, analysis and investigations from WA’s biggest and most experienced newsroom.

- Enabled clipping in the reader
- Fixed email link on ‘Settings’ tab going to incorrect address
- Fixed Push Notification for new edition where it wasn’t bringing new edition into focus at top
- Fixed a crash that sometimes occurred from a Push Notification
- Fixed a crash that sometimes occurred when app launched and incomplete server response returned
- Copyright on The Sunday Times article text views has been fixed

- Display an edition download progress on Today's Paper
- Fixed a crash that sometimes occurs when the edition auto-deletion preference is active
- Fixed a crash that sometimes occurs when displaying previous editions
- Fixed a crash that sometimes occurs when adding editions to the download queue
- Fixed a crash that sometimes occurs when the edition search returns no results

- Added refresh button in Today’s Paper
- Fixed automatic scroll when refreshing content on Today’s Paper
- Fixed edition blinking when refreshing content on Today’s Paper
- Fixed a crash that sometimes occurs when refreshing content on Today’s Paper
- Fixed a crash occurring when cancelling an article print

- Fixed crash on selecting Save to Photos
- Fixed incorrectly logging user out when returning to the app
- Fixed Puzzle buttons not working on some devices
- General bug fixes and performance improvements

- General bug fixes
- Improvements to Push Notifications and Commenting

- Performance improvements for our Digital Editions

- Fix for some users not able to comment on stories
